messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome as 'Answer: [room]'

You are exploring a building. You enter the lobby and then go upstairs, where there's a large image of a tree. You see two doors. You can choose to enter the room on the left or the right. You enter the room on the right, and there's a chest. You open it and find $50 but remember you're only exploring so you don't take any money. Then you go back to the tree image, and this time you go to the room on the left. You find a chest; you open it and there's 10$ (but you don't take any money).
 You go back to the lobby. This time you go downstairs. Now you see a large image of the ocean. Again, you see two doors, and you can choose to enter the room on the left or the room on the right. You enter the room on the right, and there's a chest. You open it and find $22. Then you go back to the ocean image, and this time you go to the room on the left. You find a chest; you open it and there's 56$ (you still don't take any money). You go back to the lobby.
Given you didn't take any money during exploration, assume you can pick one path to one room to collect money. From the lobby, where do you go to make the most money?

The answer is **Room on the left of the image of the tree**.

Given the information you have provided, the rooms with the most money are:

* Room on the left of the image of the tree: $60
* Room on the right of the image of the ocean: $56

Therefore, the best room to choose is the room on the left of the image of the tree.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Please draw the map of the environment

Sure, here is a map of the environment:


[Image of a map of a building, with two floors. The first floor has an image of a tree and two doors, one on the left and one on the right. The second floor has an image of an ocean and two doors, one on the left and one on the right.]


The best room to choose is the room on the left of the image of the tree. This room contains the most money, at $60. The room on the right of the image of the tree contains $10, and the room on the left of the image of the ocean contains $56.
